title: Update a TTO Creator Marketplace campaign

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by a TTO Creator Marketplace account. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Request message type. Allowed format: application/json .

parameters.name: tto_tcm_account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the TTO Creator Marketplace account. To obtain the IDs of the accounts that you can access via Access-Token , use /tto/oauth2/tcm/ .

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: The ID of an existing TTO Creator Marketplace campaign. To retrieve existing campaigns with your TTO Creator Marketplace account, use /tto/tcm/campaign/ .

parameters.name: campaign_type
parameters.description: The type of the TTO Creator Marketplace campaign. Enum value: CAMPAIGN : A campaign with a campaign-level invite link . BRAND_LINK : A campaign with a brand-level invite link .

parameters.name: handle_names
parameters.description: Valid only when a campaign with a campaign-level invite link is specified through campaign_id . Not supported when a campaign with a brand-level invite link is specified through campaign_id . The handle name list of additional TikTok creators that you want to invite to the campaign with a campaign-level invite link. The new creators will be added to the existing list. Max size: 100. For example, if you created a campaign with handle_names as ["{{handle_name_1}}","{{handle_name_2}}"] and want to invite two more creators, you can pass campaign_id and set handle_names to ["{{handle_name_3}}","{{handle_name_4}}"] . The handle_names value of the updated campaign will be ["{{handle_name_1}}","{{handle_name_2}}","{{handle_name_3}}","{{handle_name_4}}"] .

parameters.name: send_notification
parameters.description: Valid only for a campaign with a campaign-level invite link. To retrieve such a campaign, use /tto/tcm/campaign/ and select one campaign with campaign_type as CAMPAIGN . Whether to send a notification regarding the TTO Creator Marketplace campaign invitation to the inboxes of invited TikTok creators ( handle_names ). The creators can open the notification to join the campaign. Supported values: true , false . Default value: false .

parameters.name: advertiser_ids
parameters.description: A list of additional ad accounts to associate the campaign with. When a creator's video is linked to the campaign, these ad accounts will automatically be granted Spark Ads authorization for the video. You can specify ad accounts that share the same business center, legal entity, or logged in email. Max size: 50. For example, if you created a campaign with advertiser_ids as ["{{advertiser_id_1}}","{{advertiser_id_2}}"] and want to invite two more creators, you can set advertiser_ids to ["{{advertiser_id_3}}","{{advertiser_id_4}}"] . The advertiser_ids value of the updated campaign will be ["{{advertiser_id_1}}","{{advertiser_id_2}}","{{advertiser_id_3}}","{{advertiser_id_4}}"] .

examples.title: Update a campaign with a campaign-level invite link
Update a campaign with a brand-level invite link

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: campaign_id
fields.description: The ID of the TTO Creator Marketplace campaign.

fields.name: handle_names
fields.description: The handle name list of TikTok creators that the campaign is for.

fields.name: anchor_id
fields.description: The ID of the anchor that is associated with the campaign.

fields.name: advertiser_ids
fields.description: A list of ad accounts that the campaign is associated with. When a creator's video is linked to the campaign, these ad accounts will automatically be granted Spark Ads authorization for the video.

fields.name: spark_ads_requested_authorization_days
fields.description: The default Spark Ads authorization days for videos uploaded to the campaign. Enum values: 0, 7, 30, 60, 180, 365.

fields.name: invite_link
fields.description: The invite link that is associated with the TTO Creator Marketplace campaign. The invite link will not expire.

fields.name: create_time
fields.description: The time when the campaign was created, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC+0 time). Example: 2024-01-01 00:00:01 .

fields.name: campaign_type
fields.description: The type of the TTO Creator Marketplace campaign. Enum values: CAMPAIGN : A campaign with a campaign-level invite link . BRAND_LINK : A campaign with a brand-level invite link .

fields.name: brand_profile_id
fields.description: The ID of the Brand Profile associated with the campaign.

fields.name: country_codes
fields.description: Returned when at least one creator specified in the request parameter handle_names has been successfully invited to the campaign. The list of countries or region codes associated with the campaign. Example: ["US"] .

fields.name: failed_handle_names
fields.description: Returned when at least one creator specified in the request parameter handle_names failed to be invited to the campaign. The list of handles that failed to be added to the campaign. For example, if you provided ["handle_name_1","handle_name_2"] in the request parameter handle_names and handle_name_1 was successfully added while handle_name_2 failed, the response will show handle_names as ["handle_name_1"] and failed_handle_names as ["handle_name_2"] .
